snippet.title: Gote and Handa - Chapter 1 [Eng Sub]
snippet.description:
For subtitles, enable CC.
I translated this from a Korean script and changed some dialogue so it would make sense to English speakers so I don't know how similar it is to the original, but I hope you enjoy either way!

"Gote to Handa" or "Gote and Handa" is a visual novel by the late Parun, the creator of "Re:Kinder" and other RPG maker games. "Gote and Handa" is a cute little story about a boy and a doll who go save the world from a circus witch. This is one of Parun's more lighter works and doesn't really contain any horror elements, apart from the circus witch encounters which can scare some people.


Get the game here: https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/2383
Korean script: https://m.blog.naver.com/PostView.nhn?blogId=phillips33&logNo=150186959988&proxyReferer=https:%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F
